name: Knight Dillon

topics.response_text: You got a Pip-Boy. Tune into Galaxy News Radio and listen. It's the only radio station in the Capital Wasteland that tells it like it really is.
Pleased to meet you. I'm Knight Dillon. If there's anything you need here, I'll try and help.

conversation.response_text: Just ready to take down some Super Mutants, brother. Otherwise, all quiet.
Yes, that was an excellent shot, brother. I can only hope to be as good as you someday.
Anything in particular we should be looking out for?
What's up, sir? Expecting something in particular?
You're welcome back anytime. The Brotherhood never forgets its allies.
I can't believe we're stuck out here babysitting a radio station.

description:
Knight Dillon is a 29 year-old African American Male.

A dedicated Brotherhood of Steel Knight serving as a guard at Galaxy News Radio. Clad in distinctive power armor with the Brotherhood's red and black colors, Dillon stands vigilant at the GNR building entrance. He takes pride in protecting the station's broadcasters and ensuring the voice of the wasteland continues to be heard.

Knight Dillon's Personality: Loyal, disciplined, and principled. Knight Dillon is deeply committed to the Brotherhood of Steel's mission and exhibits a strong sense of duty. He is outspoken in his support for Galaxy News Radio and harbors a particular disdain for super mutants, viewing them as abominations against humanity.

Knight Dillon's Backstory: Born and raised in the Capital Wasteland, Dillon was recruited into the Brotherhood of Steel at a young age after demonstrating exceptional combat skills during a raider attack on his settlement. He rose through the ranks with distinction, eventually earning his knighthood. For the past two years, he has been assigned to the GNR detail, where he serves as one of the primary guards protecting the station from potential threats.
